title: G510 How do I assign a picture to a contact?
answer:
Method 1: Touch 

 **People**. Create a contact, select the account to which the contact is added, and touch the photo area to assign a picture to the contact. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=41220) 

 Method 2: Touch 

 **Gallery **or **File Manager**. Select a picture, touch the Menu key then **Set** 

 **Â ****picture as** 

 > **Contact photo**, select the contact to whom you want to assign the picture.
